cards.name: Annihilus
cards.ability: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that can't.

cards.name: Air-Walker
cards.ability: When this is destroyed, replace it with a 4-Cost card from your hand or deck.

cards.name: Bolts of Balthaak
cards.ability: Next turn, you get +4 Energy.

cards.name: Cap's Shield
cards.ability: Ongoing: This can't be destroyed. Give your Cap +2 Power when this moves to Cap's location.

cards.name: Cerebro
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your highest-Power cards have +2 Power.

cards.name: Clea
cards.ability: When this permanently gains Power, add a Flames Of The Faltine to your hand. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Cobra
cards.ability: Activate: Destroy an enemy created card here.

cards.name: Cosmic Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the text from front-row enemy cards here.

cards.name: Dormammu
cards.ability: Game Start: Begin a Summoning Ritual. (Add step 1 to hand.)

cards.name: Electro
cards.ability: On Reveal: +1 max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

cards.name: Esme Cuckoo
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy a card from your deck into your hand. Set its Cost to 3 and Power to 4.

cards.name: Fantasticar
cards.ability: Activate: Give your End of Turn cards +2 Power.

cards.name: Firelord
cards.ability: On Reveal: Revive one of your discarded or destroyed 3-Cost cards here.

cards.name: Flames of the Faltine
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict an enemy card here with -3 Power.

cards.name: Frankie Raye
cards.ability: After the next time you play a 6-Cost card, double this card's Power.

cards.name: Galactus First Steps
cards.ability: My Herald is the next character I see you play. End of Turn: +3 Power if you're winning my Herald's location. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Giganto
cards.ability: You can only play this at the left location.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E.
cards.ability: Each turn this is in play, swap to a <mark>new Activate ability</mark> until one is used.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E. Ability #1
cards.ability: Activate: Double this card's Power.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E. Ability #2
cards.ability: Activate: Give your cards at adjacent locations +1 Power.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E. Ability #3
cards.ability: Activate: Create a Rock here. Set its Power to 4.

cards.name: H.E.R.B.I.E. Ability #4
cards.ability: Activate: Next turn, you get +2 Energy.

cards.name: Hazmat
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict all other cards with -1 Power.

cards.name: Hercules
cards.ability: The first time another one of your cards moves here each turn, move it to another location.

cards.name: Human Torch First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: +1 Power. Once per game, if your side here is full, double this card’s Power instead.

cards.name: Infinity Ultron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add 2 of <mark>Ultron's Stones</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: Invisible Woman First Steps
cards.ability: Activate: This turn, your End of Turn abilities happen twice.

cards.name: Jennifer Kale
cards.ability: Activate: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

cards.name: Kahhori
cards.ability: On Reveal: Each card in your hand gives one of your other cards in play +1 Power.

cards.name: Kid Omega
cards.ability: Activate: Destroy the next card you play this turn to gain its Power.

cards.name: Mad Thinker
cards.ability: At the start of each turn (after drawing), +2 Power if your hand is full.

cards.name: Makkari
cards.ability: End of Turn: Runs from your hand to a random location. (if possible)

cards.name: Merlin
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, add an <mark>Incantation</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: Mister Fantastic First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: Give a card in your hand -1 Cost or +2 Power.

cards.name: Mole Man
cards.ability: On Reveal: Banish the top card of your deck. Add 2 <mark>Rocks</mark> to your hand. Set their Power to the banished card’s Cost.

cards.name: Morgan le Fay
cards.ability: On Reveal: Return all your discarded and destroyed cards to hand with +3 Power.

cards.name: Nicholas Scratch
cards.ability: After you play a Skill, +1 Power.

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace the text of each card in your hand with text from a random card of the same Cost.

cards.name: Omega Red
cards.ability: Ongoing: If you're winning here, +3 Power to other locations.

cards.name: Polymorph
cards.ability: On Reveal: Transform your lowest-Power card here into one that costs 1 more.

cards.name: Red Shift
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard the leftmost card in your hand to add a random card with the same Cost to your hand.

cards.name: Sauron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your deck.

cards.name: Silver Surfer First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: If you're winning this location with an On Reveal card, copy its text.

cards.name: Stardust
cards.ability: Ongoing: Cards can’t be added to locations except by playing or moving them.

cards.name: Storm
cards.ability: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

cards.name: Strange Supreme
cards.ability: Gains +2 Power from merging. End of Turn: Merge one of your created cards into this.

cards.name: Supergiant
cards.ability: On Reveal: All cards played next turn don't reveal until the game ends.

cards.name: Temporal Manipulation
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give Agamotto +3 Power. Put him into your hand if he’s not in play.

cards.name: Terrax the Tamer
cards.ability: On Reveal: For each location, shuffle a <mark>Rock</mark> into the losing player's deck.

cards.name: The Ancient One
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add <mark>Tao Mandala</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: The Fallen One
cards.ability: On Reveal: Set your Max Energy equal to this card's Power.

cards.name: The Thing First Steps
cards.ability: End of Turn: +2 Power. Once per game, if your side here is full, destroy an enemy card here with less Power.

cards.name: Time Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give Thanos -1 Cost.

cards.name: Toxie Doxie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give 2 characters in your hand +2 Power. You can't play them next turn.

cards.name: Ultron Space Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move the lowest-Power enemy card here to the location of Infinity Ultron.

cards.name: Ultron Reality Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a Drone here. Set its Power to Infinity Ultron's.

cards.name: Ultron Time Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Put a card from your hand here.

cards.name: Ultron Mind Stone
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

cards.name: Ultron Power Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Double Infinity Ultron’s Power.

cards.name: Ultron Soul Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: For each of your full locations, give one of your cards there +2 Power.

cards.name: Winds of Watoomb
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict an enemy card here with -5 Power and move it right.

locations.name: Zenn-La
locations.ability: Add a 3-Cost card from your deck here.

items.title: Collector's Vault
items: Exclusive variants available again for a limited time!

items.title: Golden Gauntlet II
items: The event will be open to the public and will have 1,200 players. Visit Discord for more info.

items.title: High Voltage: Overdrive
items: Play to earn Volts to earn rewards and unlock new cards - Kid Omega and Cobra!

items.title: Sanctum Showdown
items: Your favorite mind-bending location dominating limited time game mode returns!

items.name: Infinity Ultron
changes: 5/8 - On Reveal: Add 2 of Ultron’s Stones to your hand.

items.name: Infinity Power Stone
changes: 3/2 - On Reveal: Double Infinity Ultron’s Power.

items.name: Infinity Reality Stone
changes: 3/1 - On Reveal: Add a Drone here. Set its Power to Infinity Ultron’s.

items.name: Infinity Time Stone
changes: 3/1 - On Reveal: Put a card from your hand here.

items.name: Infinity Space Stone
changes: 3/4 - On Reveal: Move the lowest-Power enemy card here to the location of Infinity Ultron.

items.name: Infinity Soul Stone
changes: 3/3 - On Reveal: For each of your full locations, give one of your cards there +2 Power.

items.name: Infinity Mind Stone
changes: 3/2 - Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

items.name: Giganto
changes: 6/14 - You can only play this at the left location.

items.name: Omega Red
changes: 4/5 - Ongoing: If you’re winning here, +3 Power to other locations.

items.name: Supergiant
changes: 4/5 - On Reveal: All cards played next turn don’t reveal until the game ends.
